longDesc: Your guildmaster stands here.
detailedDesc: An old man peering through ancient tomes rests here. An old man peering through ancient tomes rests here.

longDesc: Your guildmaster stands here.
detailedDesc: An older man wrapped in purple, long-flowing robes meditates here. An older man wrapped in purple, long-flowing robes meditates here.

longDesc: Your guildmaster stands here.
detailedDesc: A smaller man dressed in black robes stands here waiting to train you. A smaller man dressed in black robes stands here waiting to train you.

longDesc: Your guildmaster stands here.
detailedDesc: A small human dressed in black rests in the corner.  As you enter he grabs A small human dressed in black rests in the corner.  As you enter he grabs a knife and throws it at you.  It lands in the wall next to your left ear. 'We will now begin', is all he says.

longDesc: A dark skinned, veiled woman greets you from behind the desk.
detailedDesc: This Arabian beauty is obviously the daughter of some high ranking This Arabian beauty is obviously the daughter of some high ranking official.  As you attempt to sneak a peek under her veil you notice a small moon-shaped birthmark on her left cheek.

longDesc: An old withered man leans against the bar.
detailedDesc: He looks distracted as he pours five drinks at once without error. He looks distracted as he pours five drinks at once without error.

longDesc: Brother John, lead singer for the Lokettes stands on stage.
detailedDesc: You see the lead singer of the Lokettes lip synching to an old Zochan You see the lead singer of the Lokettes lip synching to an old Zochan tune.

longDesc: A panhandler rests here.
detailedDesc: A small skinny man rests here hoping to find a warm heart. A small skinny man rests here hoping to find a warm heart.

longDesc: A panhandler rests here.
detailedDesc: A small skinny man rests here staring at your clothes. A small skinny man rests here staring at your clothes.

longDesc: A grubby beggar sits here in the filth.
detailedDesc: This poor soul seems down on his luck, perhaps you might spare a dime? This poor soul seems down on his luck, perhaps you might spare a dime?

longDesc: The baker stands here playing solitaire.
detailedDesc: You see a large man in a white apron covered in flour from head to toe. You see a large man in a white apron covered in flour from head to toe.

longDesc: The shopkeeper stands here.
detailedDesc: You see a half-elf sitting on a stool behind his counter. You see a half-elf sitting on a stool behind his counter.

longDesc: A banker stands here waiting to help you.
detailedDesc: This small halfling seems adept at counting money. This small halfling seems adept at counting money.

longDesc: Ahkeem the tailor welcomes you to his store.
detailedDesc: This middle-aged man looks over you with disdain and quickly suggests a This middle-aged man looks over you with disdain and quickly suggests a new wardrobe.

longDesc: Vera the veggie lady beems as you look over her stand.
detailedDesc: A tall slender woman stands before you smiling broadly. A tall slender woman stands before you smiling broadly.

longDesc: Butch the meatcutter stands here in his bloodied apron.
detailedDesc: This stocky dwarf has a mad glint in his eye as he twirls his clever This stocky dwarf has a mad glint in his eye as he twirls his clever carelessly into the air.

longDesc: Abdul stands here, waiting to help you.
detailedDesc: Abdul returns your gaze with a steady eye.  You quickly glance away Abdul returns your gaze with a steady eye.  You quickly glance away under his cold stare and place your order.

longDesc: Igor stands here doing... something.
detailedDesc: You see a small dwarf with a large hump on his left shoulder. You see a small dwarf with a large hump on his left shoulder.

longDesc: Cassandra stands proudly over her selection.
detailedDesc: You see a happy weather-worn face whose lines suggest many years on You see a happy weather-worn face whose lines suggest many years on the open sea.  It is only through years of fishing that she is able to withstand the smell that permeates the air.

longDesc: The foreman stands here screaming at the workers.
detailedDesc: A worried working dwarf stands here constantly making notes in his A worried working dwarf stands here constantly making notes in his book and looking at his watch.

longDesc: A construction worker steadily works here.
detailedDesc: A large sweaty looking man doesn't even return your glance. A large sweaty looking man doesn't even return your glance.

longDesc: The statue of Brahman stands here.
detailedDesc: The statue made of solid marble depicts the mighty God defeating Siva The statue made of solid marble depicts the mighty God defeating Siva in magical combat.

longDesc: The statue of Siva stands here.
detailedDesc: The statue of the High Lord of Destruction stands here beings attacked The statue of the High Lord of Destruction stands here beings attacked by Brahman in magical combat.

longDesc: The statue of Indra stands here.
detailedDesc: This statue looks like an enormous elephant. This statue looks like an enormous elephant.

longDesc: The statue of Yama stands here.
detailedDesc: This is a statue of the God of Death.  It is covered with odd runes. This is a statue of the God of Death.  It is covered with odd runes.

longDesc: The statue of Surya stands here.
detailedDesc: The statue of Surya, the God in charge of the Sun, almost glows The statue of Surya, the God in charge of the Sun, almost glows with a firey aura.

longDesc: The statue of Kali stands here.
detailedDesc: The statue of the Black Mother, Kali, is made of black marble and The statue of the Black Mother, Kali, is made of black marble and is covered with silver runes.

longDesc: The statue of Brihaspati stands here.
detailedDesc: The statue of Brihaspati, the God of Scholars and Knowledge is made The statue of Brihaspati, the God of Scholars and Knowledge is made of a weathered marble.

longDesc: The statue of Puchan stands here.
detailedDesc: The statue of Puchan, God of Travellers, is covered with dust and worn The statue of Puchan, God of Travellers, is covered with dust and worn as if it had been dragged a long way down a dusty road.

longDesc: Aziz the Human Canon stands here.
detailedDesc: This big and burly man grins at you as he draws his sword. This big and burly man grins at you as he draws his sword.

longDesc: Mustafah the Human Robber stands here.
detailedDesc: This man is lithe and has an evil smirk upon his face. This man is lithe and has an evil smirk upon his face.

longDesc: Fatima the Elven Invoker stands here.
detailedDesc: This female elf has dusky skin and black hair.  A combination you don't This female elf has dusky skin and black hair.  A combination you don't see very often on elves.

longDesc: Kareem the Dwarven Mercenary stands here.
detailedDesc: This short stocky fellow has a chest the girth of a barrel. This short stocky fellow has a chest the girth of a barrel.

longDesc: A nomad merchant looks you over.
detailedDesc: This robust fellow returns your gaze with a smile, but something inside This robust fellow returns your gaze with a smile, but something inside tells you not to trust him very far.

longDesc: A bodyguard sizes you up.
detailedDesc: The large half-orc quickly glances you over and returns to his duties. The large half-orc quickly glances you over and returns to his duties.

longDesc: A skinny kid wanders around.
detailedDesc: This small child sees you looking at him and quickly looks away. This small child sees you looking at him and quickly looks away.

longDesc: A strong dockworker walks by moving crates.
detailedDesc: Although seemingly dull witted, this hulking mass carries the huge Although seemingly dull witted, this hulking mass carries the huge crates from the boats like it was a box of lilies.

longDesc: A small man walks around scribbling in a notebook.
detailedDesc: The city's taxcollextor walks from store to store collecting the The city's taxcollextor walks from store to store collecting the Sultan's fee for living in his grand city.

longDesc: Gord the Rogue stand here.
Chulainn the Knight stands here.
detailedDesc: This large man does not seem to be surprised at your approach and This large man does not seem to be surprised at your approach and looks at you quizically.

longDesc: Daghdha the Arch-Magi stands here.
detailedDesc: This man is dressed in long brown robes and has a penetrating gaze. This man is dressed in long brown robes and has a penetrating gaze.

longDesc: Curley GreenLeaf stands here.
A small grey-haired man walks around spouting gospel.
detailedDesc: This sad case may have been an evangelist in another lifetime. He is known This sad case may have been an evangelist in another lifetime. He is known to stand on corners and accost passers-by with his doomsday preaching.

longDesc: A small harmless feline searches for food.
detailedDesc: You see a small starved cat. You see a small starved cat.

longDesc: A vulture circles above you.
detailedDesc: As you look up at this bird, you see the only thing it wants is a corpse. As you look up at this bird, you see the only thing it wants is a corpse.

longDesc: An old man sits here playing chess.
detailedDesc: He seems intent on winning. He seems intent on winning.

longDesc: Lugh the Librarian sits behind a desk.
detailedDesc: The huge hulking mass rises as someone asks him a question. The huge hulking mass rises as someone asks him a question.

longDesc: The wind kicks up some dust.
detailedDesc: What you see before you is really a baby air elemental. What you see before you is really a baby air elemental.

longDesc: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
detailedDesc: This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower body of a four-legged beast.  She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

longDesc: A raggety dervish stands here.
detailedDesc: This man looks like he could use a lot of rest. This man looks like he could use a lot of rest.

longDesc: The Sultan rests here on his throne.
detailedDesc: You see a large wealthy man in red robes smiling at you. You see a large wealthy man in red robes smiling at you.

longDesc: A lovely, veiled harem girl stands here.
detailedDesc: You see a dark skinned beauty, wearing almost transparent silks and  You see a dark skinned beauty, wearing almost transparent silks and  light blue veil.  Her loyalty to the Sultan is unwavering.

longDesc: The Jailer sleeps here, snoring loudly.
detailedDesc: You see a pathetic soul lying here.  Probably some ex-nobleman that has You see a pathetic soul lying here.  Probably some ex-nobleman that has fallen out of grace with the Sultan.

longDesc: A eunich stands here watching over the girls.
detailedDesc: You see a large man whose only duty is to protect the harem.  He has been You see a large man whose only duty is to protect the harem.  He has been castrated for the ladies' safety.

longDesc: Nichole, the Sultan's favorite girl rests on a mound of pillows.
detailedDesc: You see the most beautiful Arabian girl that has ever meet your eyes. You see the most beautiful Arabian girl that has ever meet your eyes. Too bad she is about to kill you.

longDesc: Allah is here.
detailedDesc: You see the all-knowing Allah. You see the all-knowing Allah.

longDesc: The Guard for the Guild of Mages stand here.
detailedDesc: This man looks like a mage/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him. This man looks like a mage/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him.

longDesc: The Guard for the Guild of Clerics stands here.
detailedDesc: This man looks like a cleric/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him. This man looks like a cleric/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him.

longDesc: The Guard for the Guild of Warriors stands here.
detailedDesc: The man looks like Conan's cousin, I wouldn't mess with him. The man looks like Conan's cousin, I wouldn't mess with him.

longDesc: The Guard for the Guild of theives stands here.
detailedDesc: You see a thief dressed all in black, he quickly stands as you You see a thief dressed all in black, he quickly stands as you enter and steps to bar your way.  You notice his hands resting on two sheathes.

longDesc: A servant boy is here running errands.
detailedDesc: You see a small boy running around the halls of the palace. You see a small boy running around the halls of the palace.

longDesc: A guard stands here, protecting the innocent.
detailedDesc: You see a trained fighter, ready to help those in need. You see a trained fighter, ready to help those in need.

longDesc: A guard stands here, watching the gate.
detailedDesc: You see a trained fighter, ready to defend the city. You see a trained fighter, ready to defend the city.

longDesc: The Chief of the Sultan's Guard stands here.
detailedDesc: You see a large man skilled in hunting and killing. You see a large man skilled in hunting and killing.

longDesc: A mercenary stands here waiting for a job.
detailedDesc: You see an assassin down on his luck looking to be freelanced out. You see an assassin down on his luck looking to be freelanced out.

longDesc: An old captain rests here carving on a stick.
detailedDesc: You see the shipwright of New Thalos, waiting to make someone a boat.  He You see the shipwright of New Thalos, waiting to make someone a boat.  He beams a smile at you through his beard as you walk in.

longDesc: The blacksmith stands here pumping air into his fire.
detailedDesc: You see a large human, dripping in sweat, standing before you.  He takes You see a large human, dripping in sweat, standing before you.  He takes a break from his swealtering work to bid you welcome.

longDesc: A horse stands here.
detailedDesc: You see one of the fine Arabian beasts known about the land. You see one of the fine Arabian beasts known about the land.

longDesc: A tourist stands here looking lost.
detailedDesc: You see a small, rotund man, with a strange object around his neck and You see a small, rotund man, with a strange object around his neck and a nose guard.  He is looking at a small map that he seems to be holding upside down.

longDesc: A very large ray with a wicked looking tail swims here.
detailedDesc: You see a large ray with sharp fangs and a barbed tail. You see a large ray with sharp fangs and a barbed tail.

longDesc: The cryohydra stands here.
detailedDesc: A grey-brown reptillian creature with amber eyes stands before you. A grey-brown reptillian creature with amber eyes stands before you.

longDesc: the minotaur lizard stands here.
detailedDesc: A huge lizard like reptile with horns like a minotaur. A huge lizard like reptile with horns like a minotaur.

longDesc: The death dog stands here.
detailedDesc: A large two-headed hound barks at you vicously. A large two-headed hound barks at you vicously.

longDesc: The spotted lion stands here.
detailedDesc: A large fierce dapple skinned lion glares at you. A large fierce dapple skinned lion glares at you.

longDesc: A behir slithers on the ground.
detailedDesc: You see a large snake-like reptile with more than a dozen legs. You see a large snake-like reptile with more than a dozen legs.

longDesc: A creature with three heads: lion, goat, and dragon stands here.
detailedDesc: The chimera is still a mystery, better left unexplored.  This creature The chimera is still a mystery, better left unexplored.  This creature has the hindquarters of a goat, the forepaws of a lion and the body of a red dragon.

longDesc: A couatl hovers here.
detailedDesc: A beautiful creature with the body of a serpent and feathered wings the A beautiful creature with the body of a serpent and feathered wings the colour of the rainbow.

longDesc: The giant hornet hovers here.
detailedDesc: It is a hornet, what else can be said? It is a hornet, what else can be said?

longDesc: The pegasus stands here, flexing its wings.
detailedDesc: A magnificant winged steed, this horse looks much like the Arabian A magnificant winged steed, this horse looks much like the Arabian thoroughbreds you have seen in stables.

longDesc: Elriva stands here mixing a love potion.
detailedDesc: You see a very healthy female dressed in black, with long flowing You see a very healthy female dressed in black, with long flowing hair to match her outfit.

longDesc: Braheem stands here talking to the walls.
detailedDesc: You see a powerful but slighty insane mage. You see a powerful but slighty insane mage.

longDesc: The high priest rests here meditating, well he WAS meditating.
detailedDesc: He does NOT look real happy that you have disturbed him. He does NOT look real happy that you have disturbed him.

longDesc: An Elite Royal Guard stands here smiling happily.
detailedDesc: You see one of the Royal Guards of New Thalos who seems to have undergone You see one of the Royal Guards of New Thalos who seems to have undergone some heavy training.

longDesc: A large half-orc with a patch over one eye pours beer behind the counter.
detailedDesc: You see a really big guy here who seems to have lost an eye in one manner You see a really big guy here who seems to have lost an eye in one manner or another.

longDesc: Stitch, the leather dude reclines in his chair.
detailedDesc: You see a small hobbit with his feet kicked up on his desk waiting for You see a small hobbit with his feet kicked up on his desk waiting for some sucker, uhm, customer to walk in his store.

longDesc: A small elf stands here tending the garden.
detailedDesc: A young elf stands here in dirt covered overalls.  He seems to be A young elf stands here in dirt covered overalls.  He seems to be weeding his garden.

longDesc: A large horse, black as night, stands here.
detailedDesc: You see the largest horse you have ever seen before.  Standing 10' You see the largest horse you have ever seen before.  Standing 10' at the shoulder it breathes flame from his nostrils and leaps to attack you.

longDesc: A large wolf like creature leaps out from the darkness.
detailedDesc: You see a half wolf, half human beast wearing a glove with long thin You see a half wolf, half human beast wearing a glove with long thin blades on it.

longDesc: You see an incredibly life-like painting of the Sultan's mother.
detailedDesc: Boy is she ugly. Boy is she ugly.

longDesc: The Mayor of New Thalos stands here.
detailedDesc: You see a chubby rabbit dressed in his best suit. You see a chubby rabbit dressed in his best suit.

longDesc: The chef stands here making dinner.
detailedDesc: You see a very large human who seems to taste everything he makes. You see a very large human who seems to taste everything he makes.
